categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Hallis was a female Human Jedi Master of the Galactic Republic living during the Galactic War. In 3630 BBY she accompanied the forces brought by the Republic Supreme Commander Jace Malcom to Iokath.
Master Hallis appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne as a rare champion commander on Iokath, found only in the PVP instance.
